definitions.definition: an object or group of objects wrapped in paper or plastic, or packed in a box.
examples: parcel, packet, container, box the delivery of a package

definitions.definition: the box or bag in which things are packed.
a set of proposals or terms offered or agreed to as a whole.
a collection of programs or subroutines with related functionality.
put into a box or wrapping, especially for sale.
examples: choose products that are packaged in recyclable materials

definitions.definition: combine (various products) for sale as one unit.
examples: films would be packaged with the pictures of a production company

definitions.definition: commission and produce (a book, typically a highly illustrated one) to sell as a complete product to publishers.
examples: it's a question of trying to package the book properly

definitions.definition: present (someone or something) in a particular way, especially to make them more attractive.
examples: everything became a carefully packaged photo opportunity
